description.value: With your armored visor, you hunt down everything that seeks to hide from you; nothing escapes your burning gaze. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.wNe3iG6kynF2wHGJ]{see in darkness} universal creature rule and can cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.VvCP8MdSZtXREp2x]{true seeing} twice per day as a spell-like ability. In place of a use of true seeing, you can instead cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.4Z6WeMM9uJ1U0wG6]{clairaudience/clairvoyance} (sight only) with a range limited only by what you can view. This includes being able to view a specific point on the surface of a planetary body while youâ€™re orbiting it from a starship, and vice versa.
